resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82317</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82317</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6127</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Weltbekannte Deutsche</string>
            <string language="es">Weltbekannte Deutsche</string>
            <string language="ga">Weltbekannte Deutsche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weltbekannte Deutsche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Weltbekannte Deutsche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Weltbekannte Deutsche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Weltbekannte Deutsche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Weltbekannte Deutsche</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learners will improve their cultural awareness on the topic of famous German people and will practise the vocabulary on this topic.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes ampliarán sus conocimientos sobre gente famosa alemana y practicará el vocabulario de este tema.</string>
            <string language="ga">Feabhsóidh foghlaimeoirí a bhfeasacht cultúrtha ar dhaoine Gearmánacha cáiliúla agus déanfaidh siad cleachtadh ar fhoclóir a bhaineann leis an topaic.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">German</string>
            <string language="es">Alemán</string>
            <string language="ga">Gearmáinis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger verbessern ihr kulturelles Bewußtsein 
auf dem Thema der berühmten deutschen Leute und üben den Wortschatz 
auf diesem Thema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants amélioreront leur conscience 
culturelle sur le sujet des  allemands célèbres et pratiqueront le 
vocabulaire sur ce sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners melhorarão sua consciência cultural
no tópico de povos alemães famosos e praticarão o vocabulário 
neste tópico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti miglioreranno la loro 
consapevolezza culturale sul soggetto della gente tedesca famosa e si 
eserciteranno nel vocabolario su questo soggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι θα βελτιώσουν την πολιτιστική 
συνειδητοποίησή τους στο θέμα των διάσημων Γερμανών και θα 
ασκήσουν το λεξιλόγιο σε αυτό το θέμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutsch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Allemand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alemão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tedesco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γερμανικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6127</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

VERSION:3.0

FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>

          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>assessment</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
